contentList.content: Not as clumsy or random as a crossbow; an elegant weapon for a more civilized age.
Not as clumsy or random as a crossbow; an elegant weapon for a more civilized age. Wielding it feels like reality is fracturing into some kind of expanded universe. You have a bad feeling about it.
A curious artefact, most likely construct a long time ago, in a realm far, far away. Despite not having a blade, you recognise it as a sword.
The crystal resonates with you, as if bound to you through some mystical force. The weave, perhaps? It feels... different.
The crystal resonates with you, as if bound to you through some mystical force. You sense that it could improve your fighting skills, but not on its own.
The crystal resonates with you, as if bound to you through some mystical force. You sense that it could improve your persuasive skills, but not on its own.
The crystal resonates with you, as if bound to you through some mystical force. You sense that it could improve your fighting and spellcasting skills, but not on its own.
The crystal resonates with you, as if bound to you through some mystical force. You sense that it could improve your intimidation skills, but not on its own.
The crystal resonates with you, as if bound to you through some mystical force. You sense that it could improve your spellcasting and intimidation skills, but not on its own.
The crystal resonates with you, as if bound to you through some mystical force. You sense that it could improve your healing skills, but not on its own.
Your training and connection with the force have gifted you with the reaction speeds needed to deflect projectiles, even with the blast shield down.
The crystal in the hilt of this saber causes it to emit a glow in a radius of 1m.
Sheathe your blade if you want to lurk in the shadows.
Peace is a lie. There is only passion.
Through victory, my chains are broken.
